title: Pocket Monsters: Diamond & Pearl Specials
synopsis: One-hour special split into 2 episodes during the airing of Pokemon Best Wishes! featuring the old characters from the Diamond & Pearl series Hikari and Takeshi with their Pokemon.
voices: ['Ueda, Yuuji', 'Toyoguchi, Megumi', 'Inoue, Kikuko', 'Ishizuka, Unshou', 'Park, Romi', 'Kayumi, Iemasa', 'Hyoudou, Mako', 'Shitaya, Noriko', 'Tsumura, Makoto']
staff: [['Mima, Masafumi', ['Sound Director']], ['Tajiri, Satoshi', ['Original Creator']], ['Sugimori, Ken', ['Original Character Design']]]
